duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and maintain training materials, including manuals, videos, webinars, and interactive training sessions.
Deliver both onboarding and ongoing training to new hires and existing team members.
Collaborate with department managers and team leads to identify training needs and gaps in existing programs.
Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of training programs through feedback, tests, and on-the-job observations.
Ensure that all training materials and sessions comply with industry regulations and company policies.
Offer post-training support, mentoring, and coaching to team members.
Schedule training sessions, coordinate logistics, and manage participant records.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Education, Business, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
At least 3 years of experience in annuity operations, preferably focusing on policy services.
Proven experience in designing and implementing training programs.
Familiarity with industry regulations and best practices.
Certification in training or instructional design is a plus.
